channel.title: The fact that you can walk around looking like this is sad
channel.description:
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/2014/1/Blessed_Sentinel_News-13173037.png[/img]
They must tell their artists to make shit so insane everyone wants to buy it. In the return they've ruined the game with it. Runeshoppingmallscape
Miss the days of earning a dragon chainbody because it was the most amazing looking thing. Now you just have to go ask mommy and daddy for their credit card.

item.title: The fact that you can walk around looking like this is sad
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:16, topic:538949”][quote author=t4 link=topic=657785.msg4402474#msg4402474 date=1390967359]
all of the art in here screams emo 12yo nerd
[/quote]
It is a fantasy game though…[/quote]
I don’t think those two concepts are related…

Read full topic

item.title: The fact that you can walk around looking like this is sad
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

They were typically a medieval MMORPG game and now it just seems like they’ve changed their whole genre to fantasy. If characters had bigger heads and huge eyeballs i’d start calling it an anime cop out because of the way the armour is starting to look.

Read full topic

item.title: The fact that you can walk around looking like this is sad
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:14, topic:538949”][quote author=Frell link=topic=657785.msg4400092#msg4400092 date=1390408908]
the funny thing is they could just make this stuff obtainable through hard quests that require high levels. People play more = pay for more months. They still make money but they don’t make the game feel like a gimmick
[/quote]until you realize those people that are going to buy those items are going to pay for membership anyways so jagex is just making extra money[/quote]
Yep, as the anti-gaming industry christ said themselves “If you don’t like it stop buying it, otherwise don’t complain” - EA

Read full topic

item.title: The fact that you can walk around looking like this is sad
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:10, topic:538949”]Some of the things on Solomon’s are actually pretty cool looking, like the Cursed Reaver outfit.

[/quote]
Exactly my point, that is pretty awesome - I could walk around like that lmao, it doesn’t mean that I like the game itself. I don’t like RS3, it is too much like the other MMOs now, and that’s the reason it’s hard for me to find another one that I like.

Read full topic

item.source: The fact that you can walk around looking like this is sad

item.title: The fact that you can walk around looking like this is sad
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Ask mommy and daddy for their credit card? All you have to do is make GP in-game to buy bonds for RuneCoins. One bond equals 160 RuneCoins, and a bond is usually around 7-9m. You can also convert a bond into 14 days of member as well. I haven’t bought membership with real money since bonds came out.

Read full topic
